text: "For Your Eyes Only" is a 1981 song by Scottish singer Sheena Easton and is the title track to the 12th James Bond movie For Your Eyes Only. It went to number 4 in the United States, France and New Zealand, number 8 in the United Kingdom, number 1 in Switzerland, Norway and the Netherlands, number 3 in Sweden and Austria, number 5 in Germany, Canada and Belgium, number 22 in Japan, number 11 in Spain and Ireland and number 6 in Australia. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1982. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Sheena Easton songs
title: For Your Eyes Only (song)
